long_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 50M compass features an innovative design for fast and accurate sightings along with easy and precise map headings. Orbital navigation helps eliminate confusion by using a single color and reducing parallax. Placement of the dual-pivoting sighting mirror's hinge at the center of the baseplate lets you sight more quickly and accurately than with conventional designs. Meridian insert preserves Brunton's patent-pending, tool-free declination system and keeps meridian lines down on the map for easy and precise headings. The Brunton O.S.S. 50M compass features 2deg resolution, clinometer scales in in. and mm, protective cover and lanyard.
short_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 50M compass features an innovative design for fast and accurate sightings along with easy and precise map headings.
